item.title: 宜家首席财务官称已为特朗普可能征收关税做好准备
item.description: 全球最大家具品牌宜家的所有者周五表示，宜家已经从最近的供应链中断事件中吸取了教训，并为应对潜在的贸易壁垒做好了充分准备。【原文：IKEA has learned from recent supply chain disruptions and is well prepared for potential trade barriers, the owner of the world's biggest furniture brand said on Friday as companies seek to ready themselves for tariffs under Donald Trump's presidency.】

item.title: EOG 资源公司将提高股东回报
item.description: EOG 资源公司周五表示，近期的债务水平将使这家油气生产商能够将超过 100% 的自由现金流用于股东回报。【原文：EOG Resources said on Friday its debt levels in the near term would put the oil and gas producer in a position to allocate more than 100% of free-cash-flow for shareholder returns.】

item.title: 华尔街起草特朗普关于银行资本和证监会监管的愿望清单
item.description: 由于华尔街看到了影响政策的机会之窗，银行业和金融业正在迅速制定愿望清单，希望唐纳德-特朗普总统即将上任的政府能够放宽监管。【原文：The banking and finance industries are rapidly drawing up wish lists for lighter regulation under President Donald Trump's incoming administration as Wall Street sees a window of opportunity to influence policy.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，波音正在探索以 60 亿美元出售杰普逊部门的可能性
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，波音公司正在探讨以 60 亿美元出售其捷普森导航部门的可能性。【原文：Boeing is exploring a possible $6 billion sale of its Jeppesen navigation unit, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 摩根大通报告称，新兴市场债券基金创两年来最大单周流出量
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan）周五表示，散户投资者本周从新兴市场债券中撤资32亿美元，是109周以来最大的一次，其中硬通货基金撤资29亿美元。【原文：Retail investors yanked $3.2 billion out of emerging market bonds this week, the largest outflow in 109 weeks, with hard currency funds shedding $2.9 billion, JPMorgan said on Friday.】

item.title: Stellantis 将在底特律零部件工厂裁员 400 人
item.description: Stellantis 周五增加了裁员人数，称底特律一家汽车零部件工厂的 400 名工人将无限期失业，原因是该汽车制造商正在削减其陷入困境的北美业务的成本。【原文：Stellantis added to its rising tally of layoffs on Friday, saying 400 workers at a Detroit automotive parts facility would indefinitely lose their jobs as the carmaker reduces costs in its struggling North American business.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，Stellantis 与合作伙伴 Leapmotor 取消了在波兰生产第二款电动车的计划
item.description: 两位知情人士告诉路透社，Stellantis 及其中国合作伙伴 Leapmotor 已经取消了在这家欧洲汽车制造商位于波兰的工厂生产第二款电动汽车的计划。【原文：Stellantis and its Chinese partner Leapmotor have scrapped a plan to make a second electric vehicle model at the European automaker's plant in Poland, two people with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 欧洲复兴开发银行行长：多边开发银行正在介入气候问题
item.description: 欧洲复兴开发银行（European Bank for Reconstruction and Development）行长本周表示，在对特朗普政府领导下的美国气候政策感到担忧之际，多边开发银行将更加重视应对气候变化的投资。【原文：Multilateral development banks are putting much more focus on investments to tackle climate change, the president of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development said this week, amid worries about U.S. climate policy under a Trump administration.】

item.title: 巴西企业吹捧美国工厂，向特朗普贸易战靠拢
item.description: 巴西最大的两家工业企业--钢铁制造商格尔道（Gerdau）和塑料生产商布拉斯肯（Braskem）--已经在兜售它们在美国的大量业务，以此对冲当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的保护主义风险。【原文：Two of Brazil's biggest industrial firms, steelmaker Gerdau and plastics producer Braskem , are already touting their substantial U.S. operations as a hedge against the risk of protectionism from President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 特斯拉市值达到 1 万亿美元，马斯克支持的特朗普获胜令粉丝乐观其成
item.description: 周五，特斯拉市值突破 1 万亿美元大关，大幅反弹，原因是越来越多的人认为首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的公司将获得优惠待遇，以回报他在民调竞选中对当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的支持。【原文：Tesla's market value breached the $1 trillion-mark in a sharp rally on Friday, on growing bets of a favorable treatment for CEO Elon Musk's companies in return for his support for President-elect Donald Trump in his poll campaign.】

item.title: 特朗普表示不会出售后，特朗普传媒股价上涨
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示无意出售其在 Truth 社交媒体平台上持有的公司股份后，特朗普媒体与科技集团（Trump Media & Technology Group）的股票周五上涨。【原文：Shares of Trump Media & Technology Group rose on Friday after U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said he had no intention of selling his shares in the company, which owns his Truth Social media platform.】

item.title: 密歇根大学称 11 月美国消费者信心指数上升
item.description: 周五的一项调查显示，11月初美国消费者情绪升至七个月来的最高点，衡量家庭对未来预期的指标升至三年多来的最高点。【原文：U.S. consumer sentiment rose to a seven-month high in early November, with a measure of households' expectations for the future climbing to the highest in more than three years, a survey showed on Friday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，欧洲央行推动瑞丰银行和联合信贷银行持有俄罗斯风险资本
item.description: 两位知情人士称，欧洲中央银行正在推动莱弗森银行和联合信贷银行持有部分资本，以缓冲其俄罗斯业务带来的潜在风险。【原文：The European Central Bank is pushing Raiffeisen and UniCredit to hold some capital as a buffer against potential risks stemming from their Russia businesses, two sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: NRG 能源公司第三季度核心利润超预期，上调全年预期
item.description: 周五，NRG 能源公司的第三季度核心利润超出预期，原因是其服务区域的供应成本降低，并上调了 2024 年的利润展望，使其股价在收盘前上涨超过 3%。【原文：NRG Energy beat third-quarter core profit estimates on Friday due to lower supply costs across its service territories, and raised its 2024 profit outlook, sending its shares up over 3% before the bell.】

item.title: PNC 新增 5 亿美元投资，加倍推进分行扩张计划
item.description: PNC 银行周五表示，将增加 5 亿美元的分行扩张投资，开设 100 多家新分行，翻新 200 家现有分行，加倍努力通过实体网点接触客户。【原文：PNC Bank said on Friday it will increase its investment in branch expansion by an additional $500 million to open over 100 new locations and renovate 200 existing ones, doubling down on efforts to reach customers through physical locations.】

item.title: 全球货币市场基金因选举谨慎而大量流入
item.description: 截至11月6日的一周内，全球货币市场基金吸引了大量资金流入，原因是投资者在美国总统大选和美联储政策会议前寻求安全。【原文：Global money market funds attracted sharp inflows in the week to Nov. 6 as investors sought safety ahead of the U.S. presidential election and the Federal Reserve's policy meeting.】

item.title: 欧洲银行迎接特朗普 2.0 带来的更激烈竞争
item.description: 欧洲银行要缩小与美国竞争对手的盈利差距，面临着更加艰巨的任务，因为华尔街正等待着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）再次担任总统后放松金融监管的新时代。【原文：European banks face an even tougher task to close an earnings gap on U.S. rivals, as Wall Street awaits a new era of financial deregulation under a second Donald Trump presidency.】

item.title: 美国大选前美国货币市场基金需求旺盛
item.description: 截至11月6日的一周内，美国投资者将大量资金转移到安全的货币市场基金，因为他们在谨慎地等待美国总统大选结果和美联储的政策决定。【原文：U.S. investors moved large amounts of money to the safety of money market funds in the week to Nov. 6 as they cautiously awaited the U.S. presidential election outcome and the Federal Reserve's policy decision.】

item.title: 特朗普加剧内斗阻碍欧盟提升竞争力
item.description: 特朗普在大选获胜前不久警告说，27 国集团将不得不为没有购买足够的美国出口产品而 "付出巨大代价"。【原文：Trump warned shortly before his election victory that the 27-nation bloc will have to "pay a big price" for not buying enough American exports.】

item.title: 第三季度利润不佳，预期下调，CNH 工业股价下跌
item.description: 由于需求疲软和经销商库存需求减少，这家农用和建筑设备制造商第三季度利润未达预期，并下调了 2024 年的利润预期。【原文：Shares of CNH Industrial fell more than 10% premarket on Friday, after the farm and construction equipment maker missed third-quarter profit estimates and cut its 2024 profit forecast due to weak demand and reduced dealer inventory requirements.】

item.title: 中国最新刺激政策低于预期
item.description: 周五，希望中国宣布为正在准备迎接唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）再次担任总统的经济提供额外财政缓冲的投资者们失望了。【原文：Investors hoping China would announce extra fiscal buffers for an economy girding for another Donald Trump presidency were disappointed on Friday.】

item.title: 派拉蒙全球公司因票房疲软、有线电视业务下滑而未能实现销售额
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司周五公布的季度营收不及预期，原因是票房缺乏爆款以及有线电视业务的下滑抵消了其流媒体服务在 NFL 内容回归后好于预期的用户增长。【原文：Paramount Global missed quarterly revenue estimates on Friday as a lack of big hits at the box office and declines in its cable business outweighed better-than-expected subscriber growth at its streaming service after the return of NFL content.】

item.title: 宜家报告利润增加，尽管降价导致收入减少
item.description: 全球最大家具品牌宜家家居（Inter IKEA）的所有者报告称，尽管在 BILLY 书柜等一系列产品降价后收入急剧下降，但由于利息支出减少，2024 年的利润增加了。【原文：Inter IKEA, the owner of the world's biggest furniture brand, reported higher profits for 2024 thanks to lower interest payments, despite a sharp decline in revenues after it cut prices across its range of products like BILLY bookcases.】

item.title: 尽管金价高企，历峰集团仍对提高珠宝价格持谨慎态度
item.description: 周五，历峰集团高管表示，尽管近几个月来黄金价格飙升，但卡地亚的所有者历峰集团计划在提高珠宝价格方面坚持谨慎的态度，目前还没有计划在未来几个月内提价。【原文：Cartier owner Richemont plans to stick to its cautious approach to raising prices of jewellery despite the soaring price of gold in recent months, and has no plans yet for price increases in the upcoming months, executives said on Friday.】

item.title: 路透社/益普索民调显示，大多数美国人预计特朗普将增加美国债务
item.description: 路透社/益普索（Reuters/Ipsos）最新民调显示，大多数美国人认为当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将在新任期内把美国政府推向更深的债务困境，尽管大多数共和党人并不像民主党人那样对他的财政管理感到担忧。【原文：Most Americans believe President-elect Donald Trump will push the U.S. government deeper into debt in his new term, though most Republicans do not share Democrats' concerns over his fiscal stewardship, according to a new Reuters/Ipsos poll.】

item.title: 早间交易大选后华尔街因美联储减息和中国刺激而繁荣
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 沃尔玛将为独立驾驶员提供新的节日奖金，与亚马逊一决高下
item.description: 沃尔玛告诉路透社，该零售商将向独立送货司机支付新的经济奖励，鼓励他们在假日期间到美国商店收取在线订单并将其送到购物者手中。【原文：Walmart will pay independent delivery drivers new financial incentives to pick up online orders at its U.S. stores and deliver them to shoppers during the holiday season, the retailer told Reuters.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，台积电将从下周一起暂停为中国生产先进的人工智能芯片
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周五援引三位知情人士的话报道称，台湾半导体制造公司已通知中国芯片设计公司，从下周一起暂停生产其先进的人工智能芯片。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company has notified Chinese chip design companies that it is suspending production of their advanced AI chips from Monday, Financial Times reported on Friday, citing three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司第三季度利润增至 2.07 亿美元
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）在周五提交的一份证券文件中称，该公司第三季度调整后净利润从去年同期的 1.67 亿雷亚尔飙升至 11.8 亿雷亚尔（约合 2.073 亿美元）。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer's third-quarter adjusted net profit soared to 1.18 billion reais ($207.30 million) from 167 million reais a year earlier, it said in a securities filing on Friday.】

item.title: VIEW 中国提高地方政府债务上限以振兴经济
item.description: 中国最高立法机构周五批准了一项法案，允许地方政府在三年内发行6万亿元人民币（约合8,388亿美元）债券，用于置换表外债务或 "隐性 "债务，以刺激疲软的经济。【原文：China top legislative body approved a bill on Friday to allow local governments to issue 6 trillion yuan ($838.8 billion) in bonds to swap for off-balance sheet or "hidden" debt over three years, as policymakers sought to spur the sluggish economy.】
